notes: All filters are optional - omit filters to search all content
Hierarchical filters (domain, intent) support partial matching with domain_exact=false
Sort options: created, updated, relevance (relevance requires text_search)
Timestamps should be in ISO 8601 format
response_fields: items: Array of matching indexed items
total: Total number of matches (before pagination)
query_explanation: Human-readable description of the query
statistics: Field distribution and other stats (optional)
tips: Use domain_exact=false to include all subfields (e.g., 'Science' includes 'Science → Biology')
Check query_explanation in response to understand what was searched
Use /search/explain endpoint to preview query without executing
